slogan.title: Planning was never this crystal clear:
slogan.content: Make it simple, make it right.

slogan.title: Don't risk your investment:
slogan.content: Take control from start to end.

promotion.contractor: Join now and simplify your work — try the app for free!
promotion.client: Sign up now and take full control of your projects — hand in hand with our trusted associates.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: Our mission is to optimize the management of technical files in civil works through technological solutions that enhance accuracy, reduce errors, and facilitate seamless collaboration between contractors and specialists.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: To be the most trusted platform for small businesses and independent contractors, reaching 3% of the market in Lima in three years and leading the digitalization of construction processes in the country.

clarity.title: Clarity
clarity.content: We promote transparent and well-structured processes that allows for unambiguous technical planning.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.content: We optimize time and resources through technological tools that simplify complex tasks.

confidence.title: Confidence
confidence.content: We build strong relationships with our users by offering reliable solutions that minimize errors and improve decision-making.

contractor.content: Unlock powerful tools to streamline your work

client.content: Get access to clear tools to manage your project

plans.title: Choose your plan
plans.content: Find the perfect plan for you and your organization
plans.limitations: All plans include limitations on users within the organization, storage capacity, and number of projects.

about-the-product.title: About the product
about-the-product.content: Explore the video below for a quick tour of the product’s main features and how they work.

testimonials.what-people-say: What do people say about our product?

first.content: ProP GMS gave me confidence during every step of my home construction. I could see check timelines and communicate efficiently.
first.name: Lucia Fernandez

second.content: From day one, ProP GMS made it easy to understand my assigned projects and tasks. It respects the hierarchy and roles while still allowing communication.
second.name: Sofia Rios

third.content: I’ve worked with contractors before, but ProP GMS is a whole new level. I was able to monitor progress and view important milestones.
third.name: Raul Delgado
